name: Mossanda Lux

ability.name: Plane Partner
ability.description: Can be ridden. Can rapidly fire a grenade launcher while mounted.

description: A Pal whose power is truly shocking. By altering the electrical currents in its body, this Pal's been able to overload its own strength. When it comes to sheer power, this Pal may be top of the list.

skills.name: Spark Blast
skills.description: The user releases a lightning ball that expands outward in a forward, circular pattern.

skills.name: Shockwave
skills.description: Quickly discharges electricity, shocking those around it.

skills.name: Lightning Streak
skills.description: Generates a lightning bolt that moves forward in a line.

skills.name: Blast Punch
skills.description: Mossanda Lux's exclusive skill. Winds up its fist before pummeling an enemy with a flurry of electrically charged punches.

skills.name: Tri-lightning
skills.description: Generates lightning that strikes an enemy three times from above.

skills.name: Lightning Strike
skills.description: Acts as a lightning rod, calling down thunderbolts that electrocute the surrounding area.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: Charges electric energy before blasting enemies with a powerful shock.
